ISSUE.TITLE: RoxyFileman is using hard coded default sizes
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.2 (latest) **Issue:** The RoxyFilemanController / CreateConfiguration() is creating a settings json file with fixed default values. Example: MAX_IMAGE_WIDTH = existingConfiguration?.MAX_IMAGE_WIDTH ?? "1000", MAX_IMAGE_HEIGHT = existingConfiguration?.MAX_IMAGE_HEIGHT ?? "1000", **Fix:** The default values should be set from the Media settings variables.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3959 Add default initialization of max image size to RoxyFileman from media settings
